name: Nuclear Gladiators 3000
summary: Congratulations, you have been selected to participate in the ultimate TV show! Survive hordes of ruthless mutants, upgrade your arsenal of weapons and skills and win fabulous prizes in this live broadcast action roguelike! Do you have what it takes to survive?
